$hit on the calf; ARod walked towards the mound but was stopped by HP umpire Angel Hernandez; both benches emptied; probably a retaliation for ARod's bush league play on May 30 when he yelled at an infielder who was trying to catch a popup; both sides warned

ej,abreb001,P,cousd901,Called third strike Yankees right fielder Bobby Abreu ejected by HP umpire Derryl Cousins
fan interference
$Lyle Overbay batted out of turn, but made an out, so Seattle did not point out the mistake

$Aaron Hill doubled, but he was also batting out of turn, so Seattle did point out this mistake and Hill was called out; However, the correct batter at this point was actually Gregg Zaun and he is the one who should have been called out; the umpires called the wrong man out.
